trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SEQ_00<tab>Shamani Lohmani is brimming with glee, and he wishes to share the reason why with you.

TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SEQ_01<tab>Shamani Lohmani has determined that the leaves Drest used to seal his palm wine coconut shells are none other than those of the legendary Bacchus grape vine. Eager to confirm his assertions, he bids you take one of the leaves back to Drest and press him for more information.

TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SEQ_02<tab>Drest had no idea that the leaves were so rare, and he states that he found them near the crashed juggernaut to the south of the Severed String. He did not see any grape-bearing vines in the region, but he did notice fresh goobbue tracks, which leads him to believe that the Bacchus vines may be growing on the back of a wandering goobbue. Search for the goobbue near the juggernaut, but be prepared to defend yourself if the creature turns hostile.

TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SEQ_03<tab>Having encroached upon the goobbue's territory, you have no choice but to slay it. Fortunately, as Drest suspected, the beast was indeed the source of the Bacchus leaves. Having collected a pristine cutting of the grape vine, you may now return to Wineport and present it to Shamani Lohmani.

TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SEQ_04<tab>Moments after Shamani Lohmani confirms that you have brought him a cutting of Bacchus vine, Byrglaent storms outside to see the truth for himself. He confirms Shamani Lohmani's claim, and is subsequently shocked by the blind vintner's decision to give him the Bacchus cutting free of charge. Moved by Shamani Lohmani's simple desire to see the Bacchus vineyards restored to their former glory, Byrglaent bequeaths to him a bottle of 1547 Bacchus, arguably the finest wine ever produced. Having at last obtained a suitable wine for Master Gegeruju's banquet, the blind vintner entrusts the bottle to you, and bids you deliver it to Wheiskaet at Costa del Sol.

TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SEQ_05<tab>Wheiskaet is not ignorant of your wine's stellar reputation, and he declares that this will be the most luxurious feast Costa del Sol has seen in years. He declares that since both guests are now present, the banquet can be held as planned. Noting your confusion, he suggests that you speak with the scholarly associate seated on the bench nearby.
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_TODO_00<tab>Show the Bacchus leaf to Drest.
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_TODO_01<tab>Search for the goobbue near the juggernaut.
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the Bacchus cutting to Shamani Lohmani.
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the Bacchus wine to Wheiskaet.

TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SHAMANILOHMANI_000_000<tab>By the gods... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, listen! I know you're eager to wash your hands of this wine business, but I've just discovered something extraordinary about Drest's palm wine!

TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SHAMANILOHMANI_000_001<tab>He sealed each coconut shell with a leaf─a leaf which has a <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> distinct shape and unusual odor. I thought I was going mad at first, but now I'm certain: these are the leaves of a Bacchus grape vine!

TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SHAMANILOHMANI_000_002<tab>Do you know what this means? Somewhere in Raincatcher Gully, the legendary vine still grows! If we could obtain a cutting, we could revive the Bacchus wine industry!
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SHAMANILOHMANI_000_003<tab>We must know where Drest found these leaves! Here, take one of them back to him and see what he remembers!
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_DREST_000_010<tab>Oh...hello again. What is it?
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_DREST_000_020<tab>It's...it's just a leaf, isn't it? I only chose it because it was pretty. Didn't know it was rare...
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_DREST_000_021<tab>I found them near the juggernaut to the south. But...I didn't see any grape vines.
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_DREST_000_022<tab>I saw fresh goobbue tracks, though. Maybe...maybe the leaves came from vines growing on the back of one such beast?
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_DREST_000_023<tab>If...if you go looking for it, please be careful. Some goobbues are more territorial than others, and you may have to defend yourself.
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SHAMANILOHMANI_000_050<tab>What did Drest have to say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Tell me everything!
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SHAMANILOHMANI_000_060<tab>Ahaha, I was right! This smell, this texture... I hold in my hands a Bacchus grape vine cutting!
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_BYRGLAENT_000_061<tab>Come now, enough of this nonsense! I've heard talk of your discovery, and I refuse to believe that a common adventurer and a novice vintner could─
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_BYRGLAENT_000_062<tab>Twelve as my witness, it <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> a Bacchus grape vine! Where ever did you find this fantastic specimen!?
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_BYRGLAENT_000_063<tab>Wh-What...? You would offer this to me? But why!?

TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SHAMANILOHMANI_000_064<tab>There is none better positioned to reconstruct the Bacchus vineyards than you, Master Byrglaent. You have the resources, the knowledge, and the passion to do so. It would be selfish of me to keep this cutting.

TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_BYRGLAENT_000_065<tab>I never knew you cared so deeply about your craft. Thank you, good sir. I will not squander this gift! In just a few years' time, I swear that every tavern across Eorzea will once again be clamoring for a cask of Wineport's legendary Bacchus wine!
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SHAMANILOHMANI_000_066<tab>Sir, you needn't─ <sniff> <sniff> Wait! The shape of this bottle, the scent of this label... This couldn't possibly be...
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SHAMANILOHMANI_000_067<tab>A 1547 Bacchus!? But that's impossible! This vintage has not been seen since <var 1A 02 /var>years<var 1A 01 /var> before the Calamity!

TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_BYRGLAENT_000_068<tab>It was the crown jewel of my personal collection. For years, I debated opening it, wondering if today or tomorrow would be the ideal time. But now I realize that it was never meant for me─it should be savored by the saviors of Wineport, I say!
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SHAMANILOHMANI_000_069<tab>He has made us an offer we cannot refuse. Master Gegeruju will find no finer wine.
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SHAMANILOHMANI_000_070<tab>You have forever changed Wineport, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Thank you for your kindness and your generosity.
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SHAMANILOHMANI_000_071<tab>Ah, but do not permit me to delay you any longer. Pray deliver the wine to Captain Wheiskaet.

TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_SHAMANILOHMANI_000_072<tab>Hm? Well, yes, I would very much like to drink it! But I am a patient man. I have faith that one day I shall have another opportunity to taste perfection.
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_WHEISKAET_000_070<tab>Your prolonged absence was beginning to concern me. So, what of the wine I asked you to bring?
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_WHEISKAET_000_071<tab>Is that...? Seven hells, a 1547 Bacchus! Even I know how rare that is!

TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_WHEISKAET_000_072<tab>I have to admit, I didn't think you had it in you... But congratulations, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Thanks to you, this will be the most luxurious feast Costa del Sol has seen in years.
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_WHEISKAET_000_073<tab>Considering the lengths you went to, I hope our guests appreciate it.
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_WHEISKAET_000_074<tab>Speaking of which, your associate arrived a short while ago. She appears to be growing somewhat impatient.
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_WHEISKAET_000_075<tab>Perhaps you could tell her that the banquet is about to begin?
TEXT_GAIUSB309_00850_POP_MESSAGE_000<tab>Ripples in the water catch your eye...
